summary: E McK Hutton was an employee of the Select Committee on Assassinations (SCA). The documents available are payroll and certification reports that list Hutton's name, salary, and employment period. Hutton was employed by the committee at least from April 1978 to December 1978. The specific role or responsibilities of Hutton within the SCA are not detailed in these documents, but the documents confirm Hutton was a paid employee during the specified periods.
significance: E McK Hutton's significance lies in being a staff member of the Select Committee on Assassinations, contributing to the investigation, though the specific nature and impact of their work are not detailed in the provided documents.
